title: Lovely studio in Business Bay
description:
Lovely studio in Business bay on the 29th floor of the new Bayz building in the heart of Dubai.
7 mins to Dubai Mall, Dubai World Trade Center and the Museum of future.

review.name: Nishanth
review.text: Host did an excellent check in for me even when I wasn’t around, he arranged to have my luggages put in the apartment safely. Ability to respond to you on time and never keeps you waiting. Would love to stay for long.

areaDescription:
Easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road which is just a short drive away.
Easy access to Al Khail Road.
Dubai Canal is just a walk away.
Downtown and Dubai Mall are just a short drive away.
Dubai International Airport is a 20 minutes drive.
Business Bay Metro Station is nearby and easily accessible.
Easy access to many reputed schools in the vicinity.

title: Beautiful family apartment Downtown
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.
Two bedrooms, four bathrooms, kitchen, balcony with city view and stunning Burj Khalifa will be a perfect choice for you to stay in Dubai.
This spacious apartment will make your holiday comfortable and will bring great memories to remember.
areaDescription: Bellevue Towers is a high rise house complex in Downtown Dubai District. It is located in between the Dubai Mall and Business Bay Metro stations for the easy access. The Bellevue Residential tower is well connected with Sheikh Zayed Road and Al Khail Road. A prospering social center points just a stone discard's from Burj Khalifa and The Dubai Mall. The radiant location adds vicinities to Burj Khalifa of any living arrangement in Dubai.

title: Lovely 1-bedroom vacation home downtown
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

title: Brand new fully equipped 2-bedroom apartment
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.
Enjoy Palm Jumeirah views,
beach and pool access, the most beautiful sunsets in Dubai.

title: Stunning 2BR l Marina view l Next to Metro
description:
Reconnect with loved ones in this family-friendly place with marina view and huge terrace for your gatherings .

Just right next to the metro and Marina walk .
Guest access
The building has outdoor play areas for kids, a daycare centre and a barbeque area. First aid medical centre is present within the building. Residents can visit boutiques, retail shops as well as Angasane Spa. The spa also features a multi-function room and a lap pool. You can find several cafes, restaurants, pharmacies, supermarkets and grocery stores in the neighbourhood.

review.name: Carolina
review.text: Me and my family (4 adults and 2 children) stayed for 9 days in this beautiful apartment. The location of the apartment is amazing. It is very conveniently located on the marina walk and 5 min walk from the metro station. There are plenty of grocery stores and restaurants in the area. The building and the apartment and beautiful and have outdoor pool (we used it almost daily) and gym. The view from the porch is unbelievable. The kitchen has all the necessary tools. Thank you for having us and we would love to come back.

title: Cozy 1-bedroom apartment next to the metro
description:
Cozy 1br apartment in the heart of JLT.
Upgraded design, balcony with the lake view for your perfect breakfast and beautiful dinner.
DAMAC metro station is 3 mins walk.
JBR beach across the road, 15 mins walk.
All necessary amenities (shops, pharmacies, cafes) are right behind you.

title: Luxury 2-bedroom apartment with Burj Al Arab view
description:
This unique place has a style all its own.
Lightsome and spacious bedrooms will create a vacay mood and give you a nice sleep.
Two bathrooms, wide living room and kitchen with all necessary equipment are key points of the comfort of the apartment.
Stunning view of Burj al Arab will create an atmospheric dinners with unforgettable memories.
areaDescription: One of Dubai’s most attractive developments, Madinat Jumeirah is a contemporary interpretation of a traditional Arab village, complete with a souq (market), palm-fringed waterways and desert-colored hotels and villas festooned with wind towers. It’s especially enchanting at night, when the gardens are romantically lit and the Burj Al Arab gleams in the background. There are exquisite details throughout, so if you see some stairs, take them – they might lead you to a hidden terrace with a mesmerising vista of the sprawling complex.

title: Madinat living 1 bedroom
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space.
Brand new apartment in the heart of one of the most luxurious areas of Dubai.
The space
One bedroom apartment in Madinat Jumeirah will be a perfect stop for your romantic, business or family trip.
In our apartment you will find all necessary belongings, such as washing machine, cooking equipment, fresh linens, etc.
Not to mention the lovely balcony where you can enjoy Dubai's sunsets.
areaDescription: One of Dubai’s most attractive developments, Madinat Jumeirah is a contemporary interpretation of a traditional Arab village, complete with a souq (market), palm-fringed waterways and desert-colored hotels and villas festooned with wind towers. It’s especially enchanting at night, when the gardens are romantically lit and the Burj Al Arab gleams in the background. There are exquisite details throughout, so if you see some stairs, take them – they might lead you to a hidden terrace with a mesmerising vista of the sprawling complex.
